article.name: Changes cannot be made to monitors and such from the Web console
article.title: Changes cannot be made to monitors and such from the Web console
article.body:
• Some functions may not be available depending on the authority of the logged-in user. You can check to see if you have the authority required to perform an operation from the members list screen.
  • Web console operations may not function normally if accessed via an unsupported browser. Please make sure the browser you are using is supported.
  • In addition to the HTTP request methods GET / POST, requests using PUT / DELETE can also be performed from the Web console.
    • These operations will not function properly if restricted in your network environment, so please make sure they are authorized.
